metadata.title: CVE-2020-27349 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Aptdaemon performed policykit checks after interacting with potentiallyuntrusted files with elevated privileges. This affected versions prior to1.1.1+bzr982-0ubuntu34.1, 1.1.1+bzr982-0ubuntu32.3,1.1.1+bzr982-0ubuntu19.5, 1.1.1+bzr982-0ubuntu14.5.

criterions.comment: aptdaemon: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
